00085 #if defined (__GNUC__)
00086 __attribute__((__always_inline__))
00087 #endif
00088 static inline void pm_asyn_wake_up_enable(unsigned long awen_mask)
00089 {
00090   AVR32_PM.awen |= awen_mask;
00091 }
00092 
00099 #if defined (__GNUC__)
00100 __attribute__((__always_inline__))
00101 #endif
00102 static inline void pm_asyn_wake_up_disable(unsigned long awen_mask)
00103 {
00104   AVR32_PM.awen &= ~awen_mask;
00105 }
